name: Demanding Message, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Intrigue © 2016, Paizo Inc.
duration: 10 min.s/level, then 1 hour/level or until completed (d); see text
text: This spell functions as demanding message, except that you can issue one suggestion to each of the spell's targets instead of just one. Each time you do so, it takes a standard action. You can issue a different suggestion to each target.
duration_zh: 10分钟/等级，之后 1小时/等级 或 直至完成（可解消）；见后文
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效（见后文）
text_zh: 该法术的功能就如同强令传讯术一般，不过你能够对法术的每个目标发出1个暗示术（Suggestion），以取代的只对1个目标进行暗示。每当你这么做时，都需要耗费标准动作。你能对每个目标发出不同的暗示术。
